name.description: The human-readable name of the monster to be displayed in-game

portrait.description: File path to the monster's portrait image, relative to the game's assets folder.

threatLevel.description: Threat level rating, broken down into machine-readable values

base.description: The base threat value of the monster

per_spawn_group.description: How many monsters of this type to spawn together in a group

maximumActionPoints.description: Maximum number of action points the unit can use

maneuvers.description: List of maneuvers the monster can perform

cost.description: Action point cost to perform the maneuver

range.description: Range of the maneuver in tiles

description.example: Unarmed Attack 1 + Chain Attack (Number of Zombies in the same Area divided by 10) (Round down)

damage.description: Detailed damage information for the attack

formula.description: A formula to calculate additional damage based on game state (e.g., 'chain_attack')

flavor.description: Descriptive, human-readable text for codex entries and lore

description.example: Possessing no Reinforcements at all, these are the most basic of the Undead...

tactics.example: The advantage of using zombies is their low cost...

roleplay.example: Zombies that appear as a group lack individual personality...
